code:
export async function requestTutor(text){const res=await fetch("http://localhost:5000/api/tutor",{method:"POST",headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({text})});if(!res.ok){const errText=await res.text();throw new Error(errText||"Server error");}return res.json();// { reply, audio, video }
}
